website_summaries.verdict: As one of the fastest vacuums, it cleans and traps nearly 100% of all debris.
pros: High marks for cleaning functionality as well as particle removal
The most powerful suction of any cord-free vacuum
Up to 60 minutes of run time
Works great on nearly all surfaces
Lean and efficient design hides vacuum well when not in use
cons: Some say that it suddenly stopped working after minimal use

customer_reviews.title: Edit Less than 2 years after purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Dyson I've had and, like the last one, has only lasted less than 2 years. The suction is gotten so bad I have to set it on high to even pick up dog hair. I won't be buying another over priced Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: DHH

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life not worth the price for this model!
customer_reviews.text: The Battery time is not worth the price you pay for. At Max setting it works just for 5 minutes after charging for 3.5 hours. On lowest setting with carpet cleaner attachment just for 30 mins.. Didn’t work for me.. good for very small units. Look and feel is pretty good wish the battery life were more!
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work - right out of box
customer_reviews.text: Received and placed on charger per instructions. It would not charge, instead there was a flashing red light indicating a faulty battery. Contacted Dyson support, no option except to return the entire item. For $500, it seems you could expect that it would at least work. Pretty pathetic quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Boone

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: Dyson need to stop advertising that battery last for up to 60 minutes. On full power battery last less than 10 minutes on medium it barely last 30 minutes. How can you clean the whole house in less than 30 minutes. It cleans great wish they have better battery power. After changing two of them from Dyson service center I gave up.
customer_reviews.author: FM

customer_reviews.title: Battery does not charge!
customer_reviews.text: Item worked for a minute out of the box but it does not charge!! Will be contacting dyson nezt day since they are closed night hours. Will update if I get anything positive.
customer_reviews.author: sullen

customer_reviews.title: Expensive piece of crap. I like that it’s light weight but the battery only last ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s light weight but the battery only last 15 minutes and you have to hold the trigger in. Clogs constantly, doesn’t pick up very well. Expensive piece of crap
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum does pick up dirt and pet hair well. However the charge lasts for barely 20 minutes (one room if you’re lucky) and takes 3.5 hours to recharge. So what’s the point? Should come with an optional electrical plug. Also, need to remove the stick part to empty the bucket and the emptying mechanism jams up. Much poorer quality than previous versions.
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: Warranty is misrepresented
customer_reviews.text: I checked the link on the product page for the warranty and it says there is a 5 year warranty. When the product arrived it only came with a two year warranty. Dyson has a lot of refurb products on sale and I was counting on a 5 year warranty to protect me from their manufacturing problems. I don't feel protected anymore and I feel lied too also.
customer_reviews.author: SanJoseDad

customer_reviews.title: Don't get one!
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is terrible, actually it's pathetic. It is so bad that it makes a good design completely marginal at best. Even without the carpet attachment you will get maybe 10 minutes of cleaning on high and then it's done. Such a waste of money, buy something else. Obviously I'm not happy with this purposely built flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Stinks
customer_reviews.text: I read all the Hype on this , actually studied all the Dyson's , because i have all way's wanted a "Dyson " , but i could never afford one. My Husband asked what i wanted for x-mas , he bought this for me , YEAH ! It completely lost power before 15 minute's of use , i actually cried ...... I got out my refurbished Shark Rocket & finished the house ! Need i say more :((
customer_reviews.author: markann

customer_reviews.title: Buy one used or new-in-box from craigslist
customer_reviews.text: Recieved someone's used vacuum from amazon. Warranty card was even filled out from April when they bought it. Dust bin still dirty and cracks is some plastic parts. Got a refund but had me realizing how over priced these vacuums are. Intended up buying a new in box one from Craigslist for $300. I think that's about all it's worth really. The commercials make it look fancy but it's actually a very cheaply built unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great suction!  (coulda been worse)
customer_reviews.text: Love the V10 Absolute that we've had for a few weeks. It replaces the V8 Absolute, that we loved), and then some. Three power levels and improved battery life. We don't even use our central vac any longer.
customer_reviews.author: ML Harp

customer_reviews.title: Turbo power only lasts 10 minuets
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like this vacuum, but I do have two complaints. 1. You have to hold the trigger down the whole time you use the vacuum. I wish there was an on/off switch. 2. The turbo mode only lasts for maybe 10 minutes before it depletes the battery. I have two dogs and a lot of dog hair. I really need the turbo on my sofas and stairs and I can never finish it at one time. I have to keep re-charging. For $700 I’m disappointed in the battery power for the turbo feature.
customer_reviews.author: ang

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Battery needs replacing every few charges. Returned, got new one, same issue
customer_reviews.author: William Quinn

customer_reviews.title: The best vacuum for me
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with my purchase super light weight easy use any complaint. Everybody should try this vacuum. The maximum power is not necessary.
customer_reviews.author: TPl

customer_reviews.title: Its powerful but the battery life is terrible!!
customer_reviews.text: Its powerful but the battery life is terrible!!!! It goes within 5-10 minutes of use on high mode. Just died on me half way up my stairs as I was doing them. It does a good job overall. But the battery life is a real bummer
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Marsillo

customer_reviews.title: Didn't believe the reviews
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several Dyson products and have always been very satisfied. I was leary when I read the reviews about the short life span of this vacuum cleaner which is not inexpensive and purchased it anyway. (I love cordless!) I can almost get two small room cleaned or almost my entire living area if I move really fast. So disappointing. I was warned. Why can't Dyson make it last longer or have an exchangeable battery. Vacuuming my house shouldn't take three days. Learning to live with it. Think long and hard before you buy this particular model.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Kee

customer_reviews.title: worst customer service ever
customer_reviews.text: battery failed after 6 months of use called customer service the lady said she have to do trouble shooting even though i told her battery failed she tried to tell me dirty filter might caused battery failure i checked the filter was clean long story short it was too much of a hassle to try to get new battery i finally got battery but guess what it's wrong battery no more dyson for me
customer_reviews.author: DONG K CHON

customer_reviews.title: Great suction, but battery life is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a great machine and suction is good. However if you need to use if in a car you have to go on MAX suction and then the fully charged battery only lasts 8+10 minutes. For normal use with regular suction battery life is about 30 mins. It is unfortunate as the product seems good. However at t the battery life should be much better or at least there should be the ability to have two batteries to charge up for cleaning a car. Still early days, but build quality seems to be OK although the attachments clip on mechanism is flimsy and suspect will break as all is made purely in plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Henrik

customer_reviews.title: This makes the hassle of vacuuming, no longer a hassle
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted a cordless stick vacuum for a long time and when I saw this as a deal of the day I pounced. I have a 3800 SF home that is a mixture of hardwood, carpet and tile. I also have three dogs with one of them a real shedder. I am able to vacuum the entire house on the middle setting without an issue. I have used the highest setting for specific uses and it does an amazing job. I don't have other cordless vacuums, but is comparable to my other Dyson's that have been used and abused for the past several years.
customer_reviews.author: spinner

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable Battery
customer_reviews.text: Purchased through Amazon in September 2019. Battery life started to significantly decline in January 2020. Now, April 2020 (6 months after purchase) the Dyson Cyclone does not work for more than 1 (one) minute. I have contacted Dyson customer support and am waiting to hear back. A $400 dollar appliance must last longer than 6 months. April 17th update: Customer support was very helpful and sent me a new battery.
customer_reviews.author: User_

customer_reviews.title: Battery quit after 2 1/2 months. Forced to pay for new one.
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a fan of Dyson. I own 5 Dyson products. This one however was very disappointing. I bought this vacuum on June 18th and the battery quit charging 2 wks ago. I finally called Dyson and was told I needed a new battery. I then had to pay $120 for a new battery after paying a lot for the vacuum in the first place. I am very disappointed that I would have to pay for a new battery on a vacuum that is only 2 1/2 months old. My V7 still works and I have never had any issues with that one. Just wanted more suction power. Very dissatisfied with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mark W.

customer_reviews.title: Many issues and now useless
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t even owned this product a year and a half (purchased March 2019) and it’s already useless. It happened back in September and I contacted Dyson support and was given the run around until I eventually got it to work, but not to full capacity. They didn’t want to replace it. Now, back in April the same thing happened (continuously getting blockage error when there is no blockage anywhere). It’s rendered the machine useless because it won’t stay powered on. I’ve replaced the filter and blown compressed air, as recommended by Dyson, all to no avail. It’s basically a $500 corner decoration now...so disappointed and will never purchase a Dyson product again.
customer_reviews.author: Charity

customer_reviews.title: Short life for the money
customer_reviews.text: Less than a year old and problems. First they said the battery needed to be replaced. New battery sent and replaced Didn't help. Then they said it was the power cord. Plugged in for 24 hours, didn't work. I'm done. Will be asking for a refund. Follow Up: DYSON refuses to honor their guarantee of their product. I will never purchase one of their overpriced items again and will be sure that everyone knows how they treat their customers. $400 gone. Enjoy Dyson!
customer_reviews.author: Antonella M. Vope

customer_reviews.title: Died after 3.5 weeks of light use
customer_reviews.text: Loved the V10 absolute for the 3.5 weeks I’ve owned it. Died today, for reasons unbeknowst to me. Called Dyson and spent 1 hour (really) dealing with them. They will not repair the V10 Absolute. You cannot bring it to a repair center. They make you bring it to a UPS store with a reference number and the store will repack it and send it off to Dyson. Dyson is sending me a new machine (no complaints) but I’ll be without a vacuum for a week or so. In the end, I’m impressed with Dyson’s no nonsense replacement program but disappointed that a $700 vacuum bit the big one after 3.5 weeks of light use. I
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and Shepherd Approved
customer_reviews.text: **Wives, buy this and your husbands will vacuum** Normally my house is where vacuums come to die so we decided to go big. *I will update if it doesn't hold up.* So far it has held up to my german shepherd shedding season, a family of 5 including a toddler and a man baby. Very surprised how light weight it is and I don't have to run over anything twice. My only suggestion would be... Please ADD a lock button to the trigger so you don't have to hold it down to keep on. Especially for the elderly, those with fibromyalgia and retired military with hand issues (which is surprisingly many).
customer_reviews.author: - W

customer_reviews.title: What Took Me So Long!
customer_reviews.text: What a pleasure to have a cordless vacuum! I keep thinking the cord is going to be in the way as I vacuum... just can't get used to it not being attached. The vacuum does loose power fairly quickly when run on high. Just enough power to do a couple of rooms. You simply plug it in and resume your task at a later time. I have not yet tried a lower setting, it may actually work for me, and I know this will improve the battery life. My furry creatures keep bringing the outside in so I think the high setting is necessary though that may not actually be the case.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Vaccum is pretty much powerful enough for all household and car use
customer_reviews.text: Vaccum is pretty much powerful enough for all household and car use. My only gripes with it is that using it as a handheld with the corner head make it a little difficult to use over a long time since it does have a bit of weight to it. It also makes a lot of high pitched noise when vacuuming at max power so if your ears are sensitive beware.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Kellohen

customer_reviews.title: AVOID! Piece of junk, battery lasts a few minutes, always plugging up, worthless garbage
customer_reviews.text: This is the WORST vacuum I have ever had. It only runs for a few minutes on a full charge. Fine dust is always plugging up the insides and you need a special screwdriver to take it apart and clean it 3 or 4 times a month. Overall I wouldn't pay twenty bucks for this thing and it was 537 dollars! I have an older dyson animal (plug in) vacuum that still works but after this experience I will NEVER buy another dyson again. Way overpriced and under engineered.
customer_reviews.author: Clem

customer_reviews.title: Good as a supplement, poor as a main home vac
customer_reviews.text: If you have a full size home > ~1500 sqft, the battery life and bin size may be a limiting factor when trying to clean the whole home. This is great, light-weight/compact, and very convenient for quick clean ups and encourage you to actually vacuum more if you mount it in a good location. It's powerful and gets a lot of dust from carpet. Should have included the hard wood floor attachment at this price. Overall good if you can get it on sale. Not worth the MSRP of $499. Maybe $350 or $300.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is incredibly difficult to empty and to change the attachments. We spray Pledge on the wand and it works ok for a while. Also find the canister gets plugged easily and you have to use something long like a knife or screwdriver to unplug it. Just doesnt last that long on one charge. My daughter coaxed me to get one as she has an older model with the dirt canister on the side and loves hers. She is shocked at the struggles this one is giving me so Ive had her try this and she agrees that I should have returned it for a lesser model. That lever to open the dirt canister is a terrible design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: mrs.b

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to use if you have arthritis
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about owning my first Dyson. I expected to unbox a vacuum far superior to any other vacuum but I unboxed disappointment. I'm going to list my top complaints with this Dyson: - The trigger has no locked position, you must keep applying pressure to the trigger for the vacuum to work. I have arthritis and using this vacuum is painful for me. - The battery life is short - No light on the front of the vacuum - No storage for attachments Definitely, not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: smarty-pets

customer_reviews.title: Excited to start cleaning -- Super Disappointed! -Beware of Faulty Battery.
customer_reviews.text: After charging it the recommended time (about 3.5 hours). I attempted to use it for the first time and it died in 7 minutes of use. Red Blinking lights. I attributed it to the battery not charging correctly so I left it alone for a week to then realize after looking up what that red blinking light means. I called Dyson and had the most unprofessional experience. I don't understand. James Dyson quoted that this v10 vacuum battery would last the consumer 15 years. How is it that after close to no time of use the battery is defective. Positive thoughts: it is a very beautiful product and looks well made.
customer_reviews.author: ELIAS D SANTIAGO

customer_reviews.title: Battery is terrible
customer_reviews.text: The first vacuum we received worked for about 10 minutes once it was charged. Then, it never worked well again, about 95% of the time it would not come on at all even though it was fully charged. We returned it for a replacement. The replacement worked for about 30 minutes before starting to flash a red light saying there is a battery issue and to contact Dyson. With this many problems so early on and with both products barely been used we returned the second for a refund. I really wanted a cordless vacuum, but not one that does not work consistently!
customer_reviews.author: c cowan

customer_reviews.title: Warranty
customer_reviews.text: Purchased V10 animal 09/26/18. After initial use the motor head started to squeal when used on hardwood floors. I called Dyson support and was told they would send out a new motor head. I did not receive a replacement in 6 weeks and called again and was told it was on back order. It is now Nov 27 and have not received Motor head replacement . What Warranty ?
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Dyson
customer_reviews.text: For some reason I gave dyson the benefit of the doubt after reading all the negative reviews, but ultimately i was disappointed. My unit came damaged and the battery life and suction was not great. I can say one positive thing about this product is that it worked wonders on my couch! If it wasn't 400+ dollars i would've kept it, but it's not worth the money...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DYSON STILL SUCKS
customer_reviews.text: And not is the good way. This machine is less than 6 months old and already having issues with the "check filter" light staying on 100% of the time. Of course Customer Support was no help and tried blaming the problem on the State that I live in..... can you believe that! It's always hit or miss with Dyson products and for the money i'm not will to take that chance ever again so I'm done with all Dyson products. Buyer beware !!! updated 6/17/19 - new issues with this worthless thing. along with the filter light being on all the time, now it thinks it's clogged when app passages are completely clear. PLEASE DON'T BUY THIS JUNK !!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani Monell

customer_reviews.title: Good but you have to clean filter every two weeks or so because it stops working.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this for a month or so, until the first time I had to clean the filter. The vacuum stops working, forcing you to take the filter out and wash it, and I'm not talking about a mere rinse. If you don't clean it thoroughly for five minutes or so with a toothbrush it doesn't work. And, as an added bonus, it takes 24 hours "in the sunlight" to properly dry. Neither sunlight nor 24 hours is always available. I wish we'd invested in a more robust unit. It's like an expensive British sportscar. Fun for a while, but you have to constantly fix it, and it takes too much effort.
customer_reviews.author: Ilikenature

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but problems!!!
customer_reviews.text: We are now on our second one and this one just stopped working too. That makes 2 in one month.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I waited a while to write this bc I wanted to be sure I gave an accurate review. I LOVE this vacuum. The max suction mode is amazing! I have 2 dogs that shed a lot and a lot of area rugs around the house that I could never get clean with my old vacuums. Even w/o the max suction I get almost all the hair up in one swipe. I had a problem with my charger after a month and called dyson and they were so helpful in replacing it free of charge. This vaccum was worth every penny and more. I will never buy any vacuum besides a Dyson ever again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for houses with pets
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this. It gets sooooo much dirt up it is nuts. I had a dyson stick and upright before but this next level forvgetting pet hair and distvout of my jute rug. I do have one very big complaint. The release to dump the dust and stuff gets jammed and will not open without serious force. Also the stick part gets stuck into the main part. I figured this would get better with use but it hasn’t yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought.
customer_reviews.text: With the complaints I was somewhat worried. I am a person who has been forced into limited movement, and as sad as it sound pushing a vacuum around can be a bit much sometimes. This unit does slightly more than the upright units I already own and the 20ish min timer on high for this unit is already more than I can do. The unit I got does hard floors and carpet and has given back to me the pride that comes with a clean house. I can see the flaws in its design but non are worth stating for me. It is a small, light unit that works. If you need and can handle more, do so.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life Problem
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Dyson. As an allergy sufferer, I appreciate their power. I have the electric vac and smaller hand held vac and I am very pleased with both, pleased enough to fork out the money for a third. The battery life for this model is a HUGE ISSUE. It did not last 60 minutes, not 40 minutes. Maybe 20 at the most!! Dyson needs to address this. Offer a back-up battery or something. I wish I would have gotten another regular vac. I am thinking of just returning it. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel101

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: This is a phenomenal product and does what it says, don’t bother with the imitations because you’ll end up disappointed and buying a Dyson anyway. My reason for taking a star away is that it’s a little big for my wife to use and the trigger rubs her hands when she uses it. For a guy it’s great but my wife needs to wear some kind of glove to protect her hands from rubbing. But it’s a powerful tool and our house has never felt cleaner and we clean daily but this Dyson made even us look bad. With two kids and a cat and dog this is a must have in our house now!!
customer_reviews.author: Wensley

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I get one of these earlier. This thing is better than my corded Dyson, although the battery doesn't last as long as I need it to. Not a big deal, I'm happy enough with the massive suction that I can forget about the battery life temporarily and go get a drink while it charges.
customer_reviews.author: Natedlee

customer_reviews.title: We love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this vac for about two months now and really love it. We have found the battery life to be adequate as long as you don't run it on max setting. We have hard wood floors with throw carpets and 3 dogs. We find the low setting picks up everything we need it to. Our floors are now cleaner than previous because this vacuum is just easy, convenient and light to use. No more grabbing a vacuum and dragging it out from the closet and plugging it in and dragging a cord around the house. We have the basic v10 with two attachments and have found no problems with pet hairs etc.
customer_reviews.author: Choppy Texan

customer_reviews.title: My first cordless Dyson
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum does a great job on all surfaces. I thought I would like changing the head for the hardwood floors, but it's kind of a pain. Wish I would have purchased the V11 with the smart surface technology. Don't be cheap pay the extra, you're already spending $500. The other wish I have is that Dyson would make a short stick attachment to vacuum stairs. With a short attachment stick you could vacuum the stairs without bending over. Not easy for old folks like me.
customer_reviews.author: Love My Pets

customer_reviews.title: Impressive little machine
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife, always a potentially dangerous decision, but I must say she was delighted. It is small light and does a really good job cleaning floors and carpets. Honestly I think it is better than our corded model. It is expensive, but she uses it several times a day, I find the expense merited. Battery life prevents it from being a whole house in one go kind of thing, but it really isn't what I intended it for. It does great on small medium jobs which are most common.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Burch

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome!!  So far...
customer_reviews.text: I'm old, and feel like I've struggled to find a good vacuum my entire adult life. I haven't had this long, but so far, it's been everything that I've always wanted. The pros: 1. It's cordless, you just have to charge it; 2. It's light, I can easily carry it around the house, and up and down the stairs, while vacuuming them; 3. It's easy to keep clean, and no bags; 4. It comes with many very useful attachments. I don't have any cons yet. I'll update if I do.
customer_reviews.author: Mmxx

customer_reviews.title: Still not enough suction.
customer_reviews.text: I got them (2) at a good price, but they just ultimately do no have enough suction. Reasonably good and very convenient for cleaning up a spot mess on a smooth surface, but for the down and dirty jobs (pun intended), they are just not up to snuff (again, pun intended).
customer_reviews.author: Soots

customer_reviews.title: No user friendly design
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other cordless stick vacuum cleaner, this model has the on/off button in the handle. The user must keep it turn on all the time in order to do vacuum, so you must press the button all the time during usage. It's not user friendly and will waste lots energy on the user. In fact, my finger is so tired after only 5 minutes pressing it due to this poor design. Have no choice but return this one asap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another great vacuum by Dyson
customer_reviews.text: We bought this item to vacuum the rugs and tile floors at our rental apartment in Orlando Florida. It is amazing how well the vacuum removed the dust and dirt from both the tile and rug floors. Easy to use. Simple adjustments to set the level of vacuuming suction needed. Very easy to empty the dust container ... just one button to push. Also easy to remove the dust container and rotating sweeper brush for a deeper cleaning of the dust container and the sweeper brush. It was quick to charge. And the vacuum held its charge sufficiently long to clean the whole apartment ... about 1200 square feet of floor area. I would highly recommend this great Dyson product.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Mylrea

customer_reviews.title: Almost worthless because of the battery integration
customer_reviews.text: Would be a five star item except for one thing...... the battery isn’t removable so you can’t buy a second battery to use it while the other battery is charging? I mean what were the engineers at Dyson thinking? In this day and age with cordless tools, who wouldn’t do this? Makes the unit almost worthless except for the twenty minutes the unit works until you have to charge it...... then you have to wait about two hours until it is usable ( charged) again
customer_reviews.author: ChemProf

customer_reviews.title: Warranty is a joke
customer_reviews.text: I cleaned the vacuum many times. Blockage light turns on many times and vacuum stops working. I checked Dyson web site. I called the numbers provided but they keep sending messages on how to clean vacuum. Warranty is not accessible. Don't buy Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: Bef

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum on the market!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my dyson 10 and it feels like the first real vacuum ever. Wonderful invention, I like to vacuum bugs too no more squish squish. Got on demand powerful suction at the trigger pull. Love that patented sound after each pulse of vacuum it's like the Harley of vacuum cleaners... Better than any car wash or industrial shop vac crap for factorys and such~ On maximum it's like a HURRICANE! But on maximum the juice burns fast so you will prolly keep it on 2 most of the time which is still a whole lot more powerful than conventional vacs (power lasts forever on 2). Love this baby so much I plan on getting another~
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: It's been 6 months I purchased this product and I love it ! No complaints whatsoever . I always keep it in the charging station , so I never run out of charge. Once charged , in the medium setting I can use it In all 4 bedrooms plus living room kitchen areas at once . It's light wieght and I don't get tired doing all the rooms as once. Vacuuming is no more my hubby's job and I can do it on my own at my convenience!
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: The Vacuum I've Always Wanted
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought one of these ten years ago. No cord, no hose, just a well-balanced tool. It makes vacuuming so simple. The brush/head swivels to get into corners, it is low-profile enough to slide under my couch, and it brings up dust just as well as a much larger, corded machine. Emptying the canister is quick, easy and clean. The battery has enough charge for one entire level of the house. It's very easy to disconnect the brush/head to put on a small attachment and get cobwebs overhead, and then disconnect the rod and use it as a car vacuum. It's amazing. It works so well that I actually vacuum more.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet hair
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so this is a CRAZY EXPENSIVE vacuum; but if you hate pet hair, you will love it! I have tried several pet vacuums, none match the ease and power of this. Works fabulously on upholstery, rugs, and tile. The only drawback is the battery life, it is very short. The battery on full power is less than 5 minutes, but that is all it took to do my sectional and upholstered dining chairs. Full power is not required for tile flooring, but is for upholstery and rugs if you have pets.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Sare

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I tried the v7 and it was total crap......gave dyson one more chance with the V10. This vacuum is amazing the battery life on the level 2 suction mode can easily handle my 1500 sqft loft apartment Hardwood/Carpet I would say you get about 45 minutes of cleaning. With the highest suction level it lasts about 15-20 min. Great if you have pets that shed a lot. The v7 was crap battery on normal suction only lasted 10-15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Easier to clean out
customer_reviews.text: It is great. I had an older Dyson that was very hard to get the dirt out of. This is so much better. Lite weight, easy to reach under and over things,
customer_reviews.author: Meredith L. Emmons

customer_reviews.title: They don't stand by their product.
customer_reviews.text: 9 months in, it stopped working. I thought at least it was under warranty. One hour call with the customer service who convince me to buy a new charger. Charger bought. Still not working. Another one hour call. It *might* be the battery, which is *not* under warranty. New battery doesn't fix it. So it was the machine that was broken in the first place. It's ok, I can bring it to New Jersey to get it repaired... Basically they don't stand by their product. Given the price, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: b2

customer_reviews.title: Saves lives, but keep on charger
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t lie and tell you this thing has the best battery life on max power. But it’s worth it in comparison to one that you have to plug in. Suction: B+ Charge speed: B Portability: A+ Ease to clean: A++++++ Don’t consider not getting this product. Worth the upgrade over the cheaper, smaller, less battery, less capacity versions.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Farber

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, very practical.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vacuum cleaner, superior quality like all Dyson products, very handy for quick jobs with the extra attachments, vacuums very well. However, the battery only lasts about 45 minutes on the lowest setting and 20 minutes on the highest. If you have a larger house this is not enough, unless you are willing to wait for it to recharge (1-2 hours) in-between rooms. I am used to it now, but could really use a spare battery.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Silden

customer_reviews.title: Amazing suction, but battery not so much...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, Dyson always produces amazing products. This is a wonderful vacuum The only downside is the charge time vs the amount of time you can actually vacuum. It takes it 3.5 hours to fully charge, but if you want to really clean your carpets and use it on MAX it'll die out within 10-15 minutes, which is a HUGE let down especially when you are paying such a high price to begin with. It still has good suction power on it's lowest setting and that will last around 60 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonTeacher

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum over a year ago, and it's already useless. - no longer picks up pet hair on the normal setting - filter has to be changed after every vacuum - battery lasts less than ten minutes Legitimately the worst vacuum I've ever purchased, and I've bought Dirt Devils from Walmart for $20. Avoid!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Davenhill

customer_reviews.title: Read this before you buy!!! "YOU HAVE TO KEEP HOLDING TRIGGER BUTTON TO CLEAN"
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to have this vaccum finally but BUMMER!!! I have to keep holding the trigger button to clean! If you have a big house, I wouldn't recommend this at all. After 5 mins, my forearms are in pain. This is a design flaw and for the price you deserve better! Only if dyson can fix this, I would go for it. Suction is great but cant take the pain of pressing trigger button for more than an hour!
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Skip This One
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't wait to get this and THEN such a disappointment. It worked for short periods of time with high suction. Then it simply stopped. This within a month of purchase. So disgusted that I donated it! I didn't even want a replacement. Not worth the plastic it's encased in. I have used other Dyson products and thought the quality was superb. This was a real downer for me.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha W. Canright

customer_reviews.title: Great, some shortcomings
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum sucks up dust I didn’t know existed. I love that it’s cordless. The HEPA filter was a key selling point as well. It’s a great machine, but a few complaints, in order of importance: battery life is ok but not great, especially on its highest setting and using the powered attachments. It can be a little cumbersome/heavy, and doesn’t have the flexibility of a hose attachment on a traditional upright vacuum. The dustbin is a little annoying to empty and pretty small. I wish the trigger had a lock. Would still buy again (but hopefully won’t have to for quite some time...$!)
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Order directly from Dyson & price match it
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but have only been able to use it once since opening the product and charging it. The battery is defective. I spoke to Dyson’s customer service line, they stated that due to purchasing on Amazon the product could have been stored in severely cold or hot environment and therefore the battery became defective. I was only able to use it once before it was longer working. Disappointed to spend the amount of money we did to have to call customer service the next day for a new piece.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted to like this but there are too many drawbacks.
customer_reviews.text: The entry version just isn’t worth the money. If you’re going to get one, spend a little more to get the larger bin. My problem with this thing is that it constantly gets clogged and is always claiming the filter is dirty. I have three filters that I cycle through and the filter icon comes on within 10 seconds. The bin barely holds anything and eventually broke and doesn’t function properly. It’s a great concept but the entry model just doesn’t do the job. The battery barely lasts. I’m about to just throw mine away and go back to a regular vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Turpin

customer_reviews.title: Original V10 came DOA but quicky replaced
customer_reviews.text: We love this vacuum after our initial hiccup with the original one purchased. The original one sent to us had a faulty battery which we had to return the entire vacuum to Dyson. Dyson's customer service was inconsistent, first they told us that Amazon was not an authorized seller and then the next time we called Amazon suddenly was. Nevertheless, Dyson took our vacuum back and we received another about a week later. This vacuum is awesome! We've had a couple older versions of Dyson's and this one is both more powerful and quieter. We would definitely order this again even with the initial issue.
customer_reviews.author: E. Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: Power of this product did not last long
customer_reviews.text: I bought this produce on Aug. 11th, 2019 and it has stopped functioning this April 2020. With a full charge, it only can vacuum for 5 seconds and stopped; after waiting for another 5 to 10 seconds, it works for another 5 seconds. Considering my house is not too large and I live in my house by myself. I might only use it once every other week. I cannot imagine this product has such a short life. Disappointed truly.
customer_reviews.author: J W

customer_reviews.title: Workes great until the battery failed within seven months
customer_reviews.text: I was really happy with this vacuum. It was super convenient to use and seemed really powerful. Unfortunately, the battery stopped charging after six months and I had to spend over $100 for a new one. Dyson said it wasn’t covered under warranty even though I treated the vacuum like I was supposed to, cleaning the filter every month and storing it properly. The Dyson person I talked to told me that you’re not supposed to leave the vacuum charging all the time, but I don’t think that was in the manual. Overall, I’m really disappointed and will definitely hesitate before spending this much money on another Dyson product again.
customer_reviews.author: Megan T

customer_reviews.title: Dyson V10 the corded vacuum killer.
customer_reviews.text: I got this vacuum cleaner a few days ago. I just wanted it as an additional vacuum cleaner for the "little" dirt. I was in for a surprise. Dyson is onto something. The Dyson V10 cleaned as good as my Dyson DC65. I rubbed potting soil into my carpet. My Dyson DC65 gets that out. And noe the V10? The V10 got it out too. I am impressed. If you like to see a review video where I show rubbing potting soil into my carpet and how the V10 is cleaning it up, go to YouTube and search for "Woopnik The corded vacuum killer". I show you how good this vacuum is.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Zurek

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Cut out your vacuum cleaning time by 80%. This is a beast. On full power it won’t last more than 30mins or so, but you won’t need more time. Great versatility. Make sure to keep it clean and charge it. Store properly or it could fall and break. I’ve bought various vacuum cleaners and this by far exceeds anything I’ve used before. Also, it is more silent and less annoying than other vacuum cleaners. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Dakramsta

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 6 months, still under warranty but Dyson doesn't ship their parts to Hawaii or to service centers in Hawaii, so long answer short, if you have a warranty issue they will not fix it if you like in Hawaii. Amazon, you owe me a refund in full on the piece of garbage $500+ vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Chris V.

customer_reviews.title: So Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After one year, I can no longer use the vacuum on high speed because it drains the power in less than one minute. Now I’m having problems getting the brush roll on the cleaning head to spin when I press the on button. I was initially thrilled with this vacuum, it is the first cordless one I’ve owned, but for $599, it should have run better a whole lot longer than one year. I use it almost every day on carpet, have taken good care of it, make sure to clean the filter regularly and keep it charged. I would not buy again. Huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Oneinamillion

customer_reviews.title: I am in love
customer_reviews.text: We rent out a cabin and have been having trouble getting the living room rug clean of dog hair with our Miele. The cleaning lady called to say that she had scrubbed the rug as hard as she could so this thing was very recently cleaned. We arrived last night and took the Dyson to it. Two. full. canisters. Not only dog hair, but ground in dust came out. This thing is cleaned regularly and that much crap was still in it. I am blown away. Baby is now crawling happily around and I am considering buying a second Dyson to leave here.
customer_reviews.author: treocyn

customer_reviews.title: Stress free
customer_reviews.text: This has made life so much easier .. I find I’m vacuuming more often because it’s not a haste as with corded vacuums ... does a great job of quickly vacuuming the dog hair off of the couches ... NO issues with breaking parts as of yet ... only problem we had was that we purchased for Amazon Wearhouse and the battery was defective ... when we contacted dyson to get replaced we had a bit of a hassle because the warranty was already registered presumably by whoever had bought and returned it to amazon
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Wojcicki

customer_reviews.title: Cant Believe Dyson puts there name on this
customer_reviews.text: I have another Dyson upright vacuum which I love. However this unit has done nothing except significantly increase the amount of time for me to clean. It constantly clogs and needs to be cleaned out. The battery life also doesn't add up to what is advertised. You would think a battery powered vacuum should make cleaning more simple and less time consuming. Quite the opposite. I am returning this product to one of the service stores and asking for a refund after having it for 6 months with nothing but problems.
customer_reviews.author: Frustrated

customer_reviews.title: Very poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: The torque driven carpet head stopped working and the vacuum is basically unusable. Although it is still under warranty the Dyson policy is to replace parts with a reconditioned (used) part. Which they do not have at present and have no idea when they will have one available. But they are happy to sell me a new one for $129. I'm very unhappy with this policy and cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dorinda

customer_reviews.title: Works well lasts long. Could use a larger brush head and more efficient charge base
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient tool. The main brush head is a tad small for large areas. Extra exercise but sure cleans well and lasts a while. Probably need low setting for some rooms in a medium to large house. Different suction powers for specific messes. Can always change the attachment tool to optimize suction. Hanger and charger deck could be more efficient like competitive brand models. Seems I may be needing a third party stand. Not highly necessary. I've got the main piece and charger sitting on a small end table desk and the attachments off to the side. It works without being too tidy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not paying new price for used product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased new Dyson. Extremely disappointed. Not only did it arrive with a huge hole in the box that penetrated both the outer shipping box and the product box itself, but it had been retaped. Meaning it was returned by someone else. I did not pay for a used or refurbished vacuum. I payed for a new one. I expect to receive an unopened box that wasn't retaped with square tape over the original round manufacturers tape! I've purchased these before and know what it should look like.
customer_reviews.author: Irene V

customer_reviews.title: Not working upon arrival - Corrected
customer_reviews.text: My vacuum did not work upon arrival and unpackaging. I tinkled with it a bit and go it to work a couple of times. The throttle is very intermittent. This is my 3rd purchase and the 1st time I am having this problem. The challenge is getting in touch with Dyson. I will buy another one, but Dyson has to give me better service. This was not a Dyson fault. It was my error. The reason the throttle was intermittent was becasue the filter cylinder was not properly secured. This is a safety feature of the machine. It has been working fine ever since. I love my Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: Ainsley Gill

customer_reviews.title: new dyson vacuum cannot charge out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to unbox this today, just to find that the machine won't charge. When I push the power button, red light flashes (this seems to indicate battery malfunction). And when i plug in the power into wall, the light isn't on as it should be. I see that several people had similar issues with this product, and customer service seems to be unhelpful. So I decided not to contact dyson customer service. So, I had to put everything back to the package (you'll know how annoying this is if you've ever bought a product like this with so many accessories), and carry it to UPS store. So disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: a little overrated
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my wife, but straight out of the box it would glitch and not work even after fully charged, I’d have to tap the vacuum for it to start working. Sent it in for service it came back with the same problem. Requested a new vacuum and returned the original one. The new one seems to be ok. Paying $600 for a vacuum is expect it to work like a Swiss watch. But portability is great and convenient with out having to drag a cord or look for outlets.
customer_reviews.author: yevgeniykazakov

customer_reviews.title: Great vacum while it worked, but now it just stopped working
customer_reviews.text: We bought the Dyson Cyclone V10 because we had previously purchased a V8 and were not happy with the power, performance and battery life. We purchased it about a month ago and were super happy with it until it just stopped working for no apparent reason after about 2 1/2 weeks into ownership. We are a bit disappointed because we loved the product and its great capabilities. The unit is connected and the motor starts and then stops. We did not abuse it or mishandled it so we probably got a defective unit.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Roberto Hernandez-Saca

customer_reviews.title: Makes vacuuming fun
customer_reviews.text: My entire home is hardwood and this makes it super easy to vacuum. I always hated bringing out the corded vacuum or dust mop. This Dyson is light, quiet, and effective. It picks up everything on the first pass. Maybe the novelty will pass but for now at least, it’s strangely satisfying using this thing. When running it sounds like a quiet turbine engine. Best of all, no cords to manage while moving about the room. It comes with a bunch of accessories but I find the default one sufficient for pretty much anything. I think if I were to get this again I’d get the package with the minimal number of attachments.
customer_reviews.author: H. Chung

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum! It is so easy to use and very handy. It has a powerful vacuum that gets my dog hairs off my carpets that would not come up with my old vacuum. I was so impressed. I love the attachments and the container where you can see what you got off the floor. Looks like it could break easily but I hope it doesn’t. It is very light weight. Did I say I Love it? I recommend this to people with pets. The suction is awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Kittrell

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE - AMAZON NOT AN AUTHORIZED DYSON DEALER - WILL NOT HONOR THE WARRANTY
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great vacuum that can almost replace a corded vacuum, however Dyson did not honor my warranty claim because they say Amazon is not an authorized reseller. I am very disappointed that the canister does not stay on because a small plastic tab broke off and there is no warranty because I purchased and paid full price from amazon. The customer support representative (Stephanie ) told me I must pay for the part and repair.
customer_reviews.author: CHaedke

customer_reviews.title: It works awesome for a cordless vac!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this vacuum so much! It actually has suction. Even on the lowest setting I can not vacuum my bathroom rugs because it sucks them right up. The attachments are amazingly helpful to get every inch of a room clean. I did notice the suction power does get slightly lost when using the brush attachments. Granted I have only had this for less than 48 hours but so far, the battery life is pretty good. After the first charge it lasted about 30 min with actual usage time ...25% of that on the highest suction setting. Best after Christmas present I have ever bought myself ;0)
customer_reviews.author: Old Pro

customer_reviews.title: I don't know how I lived without this vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: From day one after I purchased this Dyson vacuum I have been impressed on how much suction this thing has. I know on full power the battery only lasts about ten minutes but that is all I need to cover the whole house. As I vacuum daily I am amazed at how much cat hair is on the floor and carpet from one day to the next.
customer_reviews.author: Sea Breeze

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It allowed me to clean a dog-carpet that I thought was ruined forever. My last vacuum was one that someone left in a house I rented 20+ years ago, and this is sooooo much better. It actually gets stuff out of the carpet, and also makes a great dust-buster. I use it more than the shop-vac now.
customer_reviews.author: David Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: If you are lazy, get these
customer_reviews.text: I'm a super lazy person who hated vacuum cleaning my house - usually due to having to take out a big chunky vacuum cleaner from the closet, having to detangle a long cord, then having to plug the cord in the outlet, and finally having to move around strategically so that the cords don't tangle themselves. This made me vacuum clean like once in 2 weeks. However, after I purchased this cordless vacuum cleaner, I vacuum clean my house every single day. It's so easy to use, super light, and makes cleaning enjoyable. The suction power, honestly, isn't great, especially if you live in a hard wood floor house. I usually lean using the max mode.
customer_reviews.author: KeylimePie

customer_reviews.title: works better than earlier models
customer_reviews.text: we like the attachments & the improved suction definitely pulls out more dirt & dog hair. unfortunately, after three uses the motorized torque head (main carpet attachment) stopped turning. fortunately, customer service was very helpful and is sending a replacement attachment. but to be honest, for the price these things, performance & customer service SHOULD be off the charts.
customer_reviews.author: jrw

customer_reviews.title: The best Dyson stick vac yet!
customer_reviews.text: I resisted buying this model because of price for a long time. However the promise of longer battery life and more suction selections finally overcame my resistance. I’ve had other one speed Dysons (V7) in my homes and condos for light weight cord free cleaning and loved them. This model is unbelievable. On my hardwood, short nap carpet, shag carpet and tile it’s very good even st low suction setting. Really a great investment. A little awkward to empty the dust bin because with this model you must remove the tube and or attachments. It’s heavier than my V7 but still very maneuverable.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Harris

customer_reviews.title: CLOGS up with animal Hair
customer_reviews.text: The Canister is to narrow for dog hair. I have 2 small papilions (6 to 8 pounds). They dont shed alot, but the area where the dirt enters the canister is so narrow it clogs constantly. Hair and dirt just get stuck after a few minutes of vacuuming. It is so narrow in the canister the dirt and hair wont come out. I need a fork to dig it out. Absolutely do not recommend for use with dogs. I got the Animal Version thinking it would be OK.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff K

customer_reviews.title: Good vaccum but beware of long hair
customer_reviews.text: I just used the handheld for my stairs and my hair devoured this vaccum. This piece broke within 5 minutes of use and now it wont stay on very disappointing! Updated to 4 stars because the piece was able to stay on with the locking mechanism but I am afraid it still looks broken from it flying off during use but at least main hooks are there to lock it in. Overall great vaccum especially for pet hair!
customer_reviews.author: sebrina salazar

customer_reviews.title: Spend your money elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: What an utter disappointment. I carefully researched before buying this, but my research still resulted in me making a purchase that I thought was going to be good but hasn't been. I have to change this way too many times while I'm vacuuming, the filter is a problem every time I vacuum needing to be cleaned, and this is just way too much maintenance for a vacuum that runs for less than an hour each time. I wish I could send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Epic Love

customer_reviews.title: Amazing machine!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has been wonderful! I use it almost daily and don't know how I managed without it. Great for pet hair, kid spills, and works surprisingly well on carpet. I generally use the low or medium setting, only switching to high briefly if it has trouble picking something up. The battery lasts long enough for me to cover a couple rooms and then it recharges pretty quickly. Emptying the canister only takes a few seconds. Also very happy with their customer service. I lost a toy in the machine once, called the number printed on the machine, and they talked me through it step-by-step.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Silversmith

product_meta.title: Dyson Cyclone V10 Motorhead Lightweight Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner
product_meta.description: Style:MotorheadBig machine suction power. But with cord-free versatility. The Dyson Cyclone V10 Motorhead Cord-Free Vacuum has powerful suction to deep clean carpets and remove ground-in dirt. Has three power modes to choose from, to suit any task on any floor type. The Dyson Cyclone V10 Motorhead Cord-Free Vacuum quickly transforms to a handheld for quick clean ups, spot cleaning and cleaning difficult places.
feature_bullets: Upto 60 minutes run time when using a non motorized tool
Lightweight and versatile, to clean right through the home; Instant release trigger means battery power is only used while it’s cleaning; Requires charging for 3. 5 hours minimum before first use
Direct drive cleaner head: Our most powerful yet; Upto 20 minutes of fade free power (in Suction mode II); Drives stiff nylon bristles into carpets to capture deep down dirt
The fully sealed filtration system traps 99.97 percent of particles as small as 0.3 microns expelling cleaner air
Powered by the Dyson digital motor V10 and engineered to pick up ground in dirt and fine dust from hard floors and carpets
Quickly transforms to a handheld vacuum, to clean all around your home and car
In the box: V10 Motorhead Vacuum, Direct Drive Cleanerhead, Combination Tool, Crevice Tool, Wall Dock, Charger

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars5,444 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
